readable.title: 2250870111_8402d2319d
readable.content: A person is reading a magazine on a snowing sidewalk . A person wearing jeans and a brown coat is reading and smoking on the sidewalk by a road covered with dirty snow . A woman reads on newspaper on a snow covered street . A woman smokes a cigarette and looks at a magazine in the middle of a snowy road . A woman smoking a cigarette is standing next to the road during a wintery day .
